name: ordtconn
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

stmt.origin: a1ii(wtru, wceq(c2, cin(cfv(cple, c1), cxp(c0, c0))))

body.origin:
|- wtru
-| wtru
-| wceq(c2, cin(cfv(cple, c1), cxp(c0, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wtru
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wtru
-| wceq(c2, cin(cfv(cple, c1), cxp(c0, c0)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ wtru
⊣ c0 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ wtru
⊣ c2 =((le ` c1)⋂(c0 × c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wtru
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c2, cin(cfv(cple, c1), cxp(c0, c0)))
-| wtru
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cordt, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ wtru
⊣ c0 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ c2 =((le ` c1)⋂(c0 × c0))
⊣ wtru
⊣ c3 =(ordTop ` c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wtru
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c2, cin(cfv(cple, c1), cxp(c0, c0)))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cordt, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ wtru
⊣ c0 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ c2 =((le ` c1)⋂(c0 × c0))
⊣ c3 =(ordTop ` c2)

comment: Connectedness in the order topology of a complete uniform totally ordered space. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Sep-2018.)
